If an enemy dies while being skewered by {c_important}Rupture{/c}, then reset its Cooldown. Enemies who survive take {c_number}x[{SF_26}*100|%|]{/c} increased Bleeding damage for the next {c_number}{buffduration:AMPLIFY_BLEED_DEBUFF}{/c} seconds.
If {c_important}Leap{/c} doesn't damage any enemies, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.
Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain by {c_important}Charge{/c} take {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_IMPACT_WALL}{/c} damage and are Stunned for {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Death Blow{/c} deals {c_number}x[{SF_12} * 100|%|]{/c} increased damage to bosses.
{c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} also makes enemies {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_6}|1|]{/c} seconds.
Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life for each {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Fury spent.
{c_important}Kick{/c} makes enemies it damages {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds.
Increase the Damage Reduction gained while you are {c_important}Fortified{/c} by an additional {c_number}+[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.
While {c_important}Berserking{/c}, Fury Generation is increased by {c_number}x[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c}.
While using a Slashing weapon, {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} also inflicts {c_number}{Dot:DEBUFF_BLEED}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds.
After using {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} for {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds, {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} deals {c_number}x[{SF_13}* 100|%|]{/c} increased damage until it is cancelled.
If at least {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} enemies are nearby when {c_important}War Cry{/c} is cast, its damage bonus is increased by {c_number}[{SF_9} *100|%|]{/c}.
{c_important}War Cry{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}({fortified:MOD_FORTIFY_BASE}){/c} as {c_important}Fortify{/c}.

Dealing direct damage to an enemy with a Skill that is not {c_important}Upheaval{/c} causes your next cast of {c_important}Upheaval{/c} to deal {c_number}x[{SF_12}  * 100|%|]{/c} increased damage, stacking up to {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} times.

If {c_important}Upheaval{/c} deals damage to {c_number}[{SF_18}]{/c} or more enemies you gain {c_important}Berserking{/c} for {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds, or {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds if it deals damage to {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} or more enemies.
Enemies killed by {c_important}Rupture{/c} Heal you for {c_number}[{SF_21}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life.
Killing enemies with {c_important}Rupture{/c} increases your Attack Speed by {c_number}+[{SF_23} * 100|%|]{/c} for{c_number}{buffduration:ATTACK_SPEED}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Rend{/c} deals {c_number}x[{SF_9}*100|%|]{/c} increased Bleeding damage to enemies that are already Bleeding.
Direct damage with {c_important}Rend{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} Fury per enemy hit, up to a maximum of {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} Fury.
{c_important}Rallying Cry{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} Fury. You gain {c_number}+[{SF_8} * 100|%|]{/c} increased Resource Generation from {c_important}Rallying Cry{/c}

{c_important}Rallying Cry{/c} grants {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}({fortified:MOD_FORTIFY_BASE}){/c} as {c_important}Fortify{/c}.Â While Rallying Cry is active, you gain an additional {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}({fortified:MOD_FORTIFY_PERHIT}){/c} as {c_important}Fortify{/c} each time you take or deal direct damage.
If {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} damages an enemy, gain {c_important}Berserking{/c} for {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} gains {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} additional Charge.
If {c_important}Leap{/c} damages at least one enemy, gain {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} Fury.
Enemies damaged by {c_important}Leap{/c} are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADEB_SLOW}{/c} seconds.
Reduce the Cooldown of your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} skill by {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} second for each enemy damaged by {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c}.
{c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} generates {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Fury.
After {c_important}Overpowering{/c} with {c_important}Hammer of the Ancients{/c} you deal {c_number}[{SF_18} * 100]%{/c} more damage for {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADE_BONUS_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Hammer of the Ancients{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100]%{/c} additional damage for each point of Fury you had when using it.
Lunging Strike also inflicts {c_number}{dot:BLEEDING}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{buffduration:BLEEDING}{/c} seconds.
Critical Strikes with {c_important}Lunging Strike{/c} grant you {c_important}Berserking{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_9}|1|]{/c} seconds.

If {c_important}Kick{/c} damages an enemy, it consumes all of your Fury and deals an additional {c_number}{payload:UPGRADEA_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage per {c_number}{SF_22}{/c} Fury spent. {c_important}Kick{/c} no longer Knocks Back enemies.

{c_important}Kicked{/c} enemies deal {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_IMPACT_MOD}{/c} damage to enemies they collide with while being Knocked Back. Enemies damaged this way are Knocked Down for {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} seconds.
While {c_important}Iron Skin{/c} is active, restore Life equal to {c_number}[{SF_7} * 100|%|]{/c} of the Barrier's original amount per second.

{c_important}Iron Skin{/c} also grants {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}({fortified:PAYLOAD_FORTIFY_BASE}){/c} as {c_important}Fortify{/c}.Â Double this amount if cast while below {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%|]{/c} Life.
While {c_important}Berserking{/c}, your other skills gain {c_number}[{SF_13}*100}|%|]{/c} Attack Speed for each stack of Frenzy you have.
You gain {c_number}x[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for each stack of {c_important}Frenzy{/c} you currently have.
Hitting an enemy with both hits of {c_important}Double Swing{/c} makes them {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_6}]{/c} second.
Casting {c_important}Double Swing{/c} while {c_important}Berserking{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} additional seconds of {c_important}Berserking{/c}.
Reduce {c_important}Charge's{/c} Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds if it Knocks Back an enemy into terrain.
Damaging enemies with {c_important}Charge{/c} makes them {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}[SF_18]{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Flay{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%|]{/c} chance to make the enemy {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}2{/c} seconds. Double this chance when using a Two-Handed weapon.

When {c_important}Flay{/c} deals direct damage you gain {c_number}[{SF_19} * 100]%{/c} damage reduction and {c_number}[{SF_21}]{/c} Thorns for {c_number}[{SF_17}]{/c} seconds.  This stacks up to {c_number}[{SF_12}]{/c} times.
If {c_important}Death Blow{/c} damages at least one enemy, gain {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} Fury.
If {c_important}Death Blow{/c} damages at least one enemy, gain {c_important}Berserking{/c} for {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} seconds.
While {c_important}Challenging Shout{/c} is active you gain {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} Fury each time you take damage.
While {c_important}Challenging Shout{/c} is active, gain Thorns equal to {c_number}+[{SF_12} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life.

After {c_important}Critically Striking{/c} {c_number}[{SF_13}]{/c} times with {c_important}Bash{/c} using a Two-Handed weapon your next {c_Important}Core{/c} or {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} skill will {c_important}Overpower{/c}.
Damaging a Stunned enemy with {c_important}Bash{/c} generates an additional {c_number}[SF_4]{/c} Fury, or {c_number}[{SF_4} + {SF_8}]{/c} Fury if using a Two-Handed weapon.
While using Two-Handed weapons you deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage.
{c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, but cost {c_number}x[{SF_0}*-1*100|%|]{/c} more.
Increase your Thorns by {c_number}+[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.

Dealing direct damage with a Two-Handed Bludgeoning, Two-Handed Slashing, or Dual Wielded weapons grants {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_BLUNT_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.

While all three damage bonuses are active, you gain an additional {c_number}x[{SF_7}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
Attack Speed is increased by {c_number}+[{Script Formula 0}*100|%|]{/c} while using One-Handed weapons.
Gain {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} additional Maximum Life.
{c_important}Basic{/c} skills generate {c_number}x[{Script Formula 0}*100|%|]{/c} more Fury when using Two-Handed weapons.
Dealing direct damage with a {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} skill causes your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill to make enemies {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_0}|1|]{/c} seconds.
Your {c_important}Shout{/c} Skills cause enemies to deal {c_number}x[{SF_2} * 100|%|]{/c} less damage for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Increase your Maximum Fury by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c}.
Your {c_important}Overpower{/c} deals {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage when using a Two-Handed weapon

Your {c_important}Shouts{/c} also Heal allies for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of their Maximum Life per second.
Damage Reduction against Elites is increased by {c_number}x[({SF_0}*sLevel)*100|%|]{/c}.
Increase {c_important}Berserk's{/c} maximum duration by {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds and increase its damage bonus by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.
Killing a Bleeding enemy creates an explosion that inflicts {c_number}{dot:BLEEDING}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds.
You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*sLevel*100|%|]{/c} increased damage against Immobilized, Stunned, or Slowed enemies.
When a {c_important}Brawling{/c} Skill damages at least one enemy, gain {c_important}Berserking{/c} for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} |4second.:seconds.
Your Bleeding effects deal {c_number}x[{SF_0} *100|%|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies.
Each time you swap weapons, gain {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Fury.
You deal {c_number}x[{SF_3} * 100|%|]{/c} increased damage to Close enemies and gain {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%|]{/c} Distant Damage Reduction.
Your Bleeding effects Slow enemies by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.
Each time you take direct damage gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|1%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}({fortified:FORTIFY}){/c} as {c_important}Fortify{/c}.
Gain {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Thorns. Also gain {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} Thorns for each {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} bonus Maximum Life you have.
Movement Speed is increased by {c_number}+[{Script Formula 0}*sLevel*100|%|]{/c}.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Skills using Bludgeoning weapons have up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to Stun enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds, or up to a {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} chance when using a Two-Handed Bludgeoning weapon.
You deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage against {c_important}Injured{/c} enemies.
Dealing direct damage to an enemy after swapping weapons reduces {c_important}Iron Maelstrom's{/c} Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} second.

Each of the Ancients gains additional power:

{c_label}Korlic:{/c} You gain {c_number}10{/c} Fury each time Korlic damages an enemy with {c_important}Frenzy{/c}.
{c_label}Talic:{/c} Enemies are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} second when damaged by his {c_important}Whirlwind{/c}.
{c_label}Madawc:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Stun enemies for {c_number}{SF_19}{/c} seconds when using his {c_important}Upheaval{/c}.
{c_important}Iron Maelstrom{/c} gains {c_number}+[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance and deals {c_number}x[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage
While {c_important}Wrath of the Berserker{/c} is active, every {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} Fury you spend increases {c_important}Berserk's{/c} damage bonus by {c_number}x[{SF_6}*100|%|]{/c}
While {c_important}Call of the Ancients{/c} is active, gain {c_number}+[{SF_13}*100|%|]{/c} bonus Attack Speed and {c_number}x[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
While {c_important}Wrath of the Berserker{/c} is active, gain {c_number}+[{SF_3} * 100|%|]{/c} increased Movement Speed and increase Fury Generation by {c_number}x[{SF_14} * 100|%|]{/c}

Korlic leaps at enemies, dealing {c_number}{payload:LEAP_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage and swings his weapons in a frenzy, dealing {c_number}{payload:FRENZY_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage per hit.

Talic spins in a whirlwind rapidly attacking enemies for {c_number}{payload:WHIRLWIND_TOOLTIP}{/c} damage.

Reactivate a second time to attach a chain to your Two-Handed Slashing weapon and swipe it in front of you, dealing {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE_SLASH}{/c} damage and {c_number}{dot:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE_SLASH_BLEED}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{buffduration:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE_SLASH_BLEED}{/c} seconds.

1HSword_Unique_Barb_100.desc: After generating {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill creates a {c_important}Dust Devil{/c} that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage to enemies behind the target.
1HSword_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"Without him the wine is less sweet, the hearth less warm, and our blades less keen. He deserved to see ten thousand more suns. Our blood-brother is gone, but Bul-Kathos willing, we will meet again one day."
- Sorrowsong for Ramaladni
1HSword_Unique_Barb_100.name: Ramaladni's Magnum Opus

2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} launches {c_number}2{/c} additional chains. Enemies hit by {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} are Slowed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"Weapons wielded by the fiercest warriors often catch the eye of the Ancient spirits. If the wielder is worthy, the spirits may bless the steel with their strength."
- Gerti, Oxen Tribe Forgemaster
2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.name: Ancients' Oath

2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Upheaval{/c} ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.flavor: The demon prince Ikonoth slew hundreds of the Heavenly Host with this infernal hammer before falling to none other than the Archangel Imperius himself.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.name: Hellhammer

2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.desc: {c_important}Death Blow{/c} creates a shockwave, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset {c_important}Death Blow's{/c} Cooldown.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.flavor: The malformed snake creatures that reside in the swamps are not content with simply killing their prey. They seem to take a malicious pleasure from inflicting as much suffering as possible before death.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.name: Overkill

2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.desc: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with {c_important}Rupture{/c} creates a blood pool that inflicts {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Bleeding damage.
2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.flavor:
"We've been fighting these flesh-eaters for so long, been soaked in so much blood, that after a while it's difficult to tell what side you're truly on."
- Daelyr, Crane Tribe warrior
2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.name: Fields of Crimson

Boots_Unique_Barb_100.desc: After gaining the final damage bonus from {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c}, you automatically cast {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} and gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fury. This cannot happen more than once every {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
Boots_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home."
- A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos
Boots_Unique_Barb_100.name: 100,000 Steps

Chest_Unique_Barb_002.desc: While {c_important}Berserking{/c}, you deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage every second to surrounding enemies.
Chest_Unique_Barb_002.flavor: The city of Harrogath, the final bastion of resistance against Baal's assault on Mt. Arreat, was reduced to rubble when the Worldstone was destroyed. The survivors never forgave the betrayal that led to the loss of their home.
Chest_Unique_Barb_002.name: Rage of Harrogath

Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} explodes after it ends, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the total base damage dealt to surrounding enemies as Fire damage.
Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"The brutish, almost simplistic construction of these gloves belies the strength they bestow. Gohr was clearly no craftsman, but it would be foolish to ignore the triumph of his work."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.name: Gohr's Devastating Grips

Ring_Unique_Barb_001.desc: Each point of Fury you generate while at max Fury grants your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1  * Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c}.
Ring_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"The change that overtook my brother in the heat of battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear."
- Captain Davinus
Ring_Unique_Barb_001.name: Battle Trance

TESTstephen_unique_barbarian_mace2h.desc: (PH) Consecutive Hammer of the Ancients increase the next cast's damage by {c_number}{Affix_Value_1}%{/c} up to {{Affix_Value_1}*2}% and its radius by {c_number}{Affix_Value_2}%{/c} up to {{Affix_Value_2}*2}%.
TESTstephen_unique_barbarian_mace2h.name: of Hammering

legendary_druid_002.desc: After killing an enemy with {c_important}Shred{/c}, your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill generates {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more Spirit and deals {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage.
legendary_druid_002.name: of the Unsatiated

legendary_druid_005.desc: Gain {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Spirit when you are struck as a Werebear.
legendary_druid_005.name: Mangled

legendary_druid_010.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Wind Shear{/c} has up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to fully restore your Spirit.
legendary_druid_010.name: of the Calm Breeze

legendary_druid_012.desc: Gain {c_important}Stealth{/c} for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds when killing enemies with {c_important}Shred{/c}. Breaking {c_important}Stealth{/c} with an attack grants Ambush which guarantees Critical Strikes for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.

legendary_druid_013.desc: {c_important}Hurricane{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} each second while active.
legendary_druid_013.name: of the Tempest

legendary_druid_018.desc: Damage from {c_important}Earth{/c} skills Slow enemies hit by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_018.name: of Quicksand

legendary_druid_023.desc: {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more Critical Strike damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.
legendary_druid_023.name: Crashstone

legendary_druid_026.desc: The duration of {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds. In addition, killing an enemy with {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills replenishes {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} of your active {c_important}Earthen Bulwark's{/c} barrier.
legendary_druid_026.name: of Mending Stone

legendary_druid_028.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance when dealing Lightning damage to overload the target for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, causing any direct damage you deal to them to pulse {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} additional damage to surrounding enemies.
legendary_druid_028.name: Overcharged

legendary_druid_029.desc:
Casting a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill grants your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} Critical Strike Damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Casting a {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 /3.75|1%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_029.name: of Natural Balance

legendary_druid_038.desc: {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills restore {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} Spirit when you hit enemies afflicted by your Poisons. When Spirit is restored, your Poison effects are removed from the enemy.
legendary_druid_038.name: of the Changeling's Debt

legendary_druid_042.desc: When you use a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill that changes your form, gain {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life. If you are at full Life, gain the same amount as {c_important}Fortify{/c}.
legendary_druid_042.name: Skinwalker's

legendary_druid_047.desc: {c_important}Earthspike{/c} launches spikes in a line and has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} second cooldown.
legendary_druid_047.name: Seismic-shift

legendary_druid_049.desc: {c_important}Trample{/c} now summons {c_important}Landslides{/c} during it's duration that deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} normal damage. {c_important}Trample{/c} is now also a {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} and {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill.
legendary_druid_049.name: of the Trampled Earth

legendary_druid_057.desc: Your {c_important}Earth skills{/c} are now also {c_important}Werebear skills{/c} and {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c}.
legendary_druid_057.name: Stonefur

legendary_druid_058.desc:
{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Storm skills{/c} have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Spirit.

Your base {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills are now also {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills
legendary_druid_058.name: Storm Beast's

legendary_druid_059.desc: Critical strikes with {c_important}Shred{/c} deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the damage dealt as lightning to the target and surrounding enemies.
legendary_druid_059.name: Stormclaw's

legendary_druid_060.desc: Increase your maximum Spirit by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} and Spirit Generation by {c_number}x[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active.
legendary_druid_060.name: Balanced

legendary_druid_062.desc: {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} also provides Physical Damage Reduction. In addition, {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} will also be applied to all Nearby Allies.
legendary_druid_062.name: of Cyclonic Force

legendary_druid_063.desc: Landslide strikes an additional {c_number}3{/c} times and deals an additional {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus damage per strike.
legendary_druid_063.name: of The Aftershock

legendary_druid_066.desc: {c_important}Pulverize{/c} is now also an {c_important}Earth{/c} skill. After casting {c_important}Pulverize{/c}, tectonic spikes continue to deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_066.name: of the Ursine Horror

legendary_druid_071.desc: Your {c_important}Core{/c} skills deal up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|] {/c} increased damage based on your percent {c_important}Fortified Health{/c}.
legendary_druid_071.name: of Retaliation

legendary_druid_074.desc: Pulverize creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its damage to targets in the path.
legendary_druid_074.name: Shockwave

legendary_druid_075.desc: Your {c_important}Wolf{/c} companions are now {c_important}Werewolf{/c} companions. {c_important}Werewolf{/c} companions deal {c_number}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} additional damage and can spread {c_important}Rabies{/c}.
legendary_druid_075.name: of the Alpha

legendary_druid_077.desc: {c_important}Blood Howl{/c} increases Critical Strike Chance by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c}. In addition, {c_important}Blood Howl{/c} also affects Nearby Companions and Players for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_077.name: Nighthowler's

legendary_druid_078.desc: {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills function as {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills and {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills function as {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills for the {c_important}Nature's Fury{/c} passive.
legendary_druid_078.name: of Nature's Savagery

legendary_druid_080.desc: {c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal an additional {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} damage for each active Companion.
legendary_druid_080.name: Shepherd's

legendary_druid_100.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} Damage Reduction while Shapeshifted into a Werewolf.
legendary_druid_100.name: Vigorous

legendary_druid_102.desc: {c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c} is now a {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill. In addition, {c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c} will Immobilize Poisoned enemies for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_102.name: of the Dark Howl

legendary_druid_104.desc: The duration of {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} for the duration.
legendary_druid_104.name: of the Rampaging Werebeast

legendary_druid_106.desc: Your {c_important}Companions{/c} gain the bonuses from {c_important}Bestial Rampage{/c}.
legendary_druid_106.name: of the Wildrage

legendary_druid_108.desc: When you have {c_important}Fortified{/c} Life your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills gain {c_number}+[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
legendary_druid_108.name: Ballistic

legendary_druid_109.desc: While {c_important}Hurricane{/c} is active, gain {c_number}+[Affix_Value_1]{/c} to your {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skills.
legendary_druid_109.name: Stormshifter's

legendary_druid_111.desc: Critical strikes with {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills charge the air around you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds causing a {c_important}Lightning Strike{/c} to periodically hit an enemy in the area for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage.
legendary_druid_111.name: Runeworker's Conduit

legendary_druid_112.desc: The {c_important}Earthen Might{/c} talent also applies to your {c_important}Storm{/c} skills.
legendary_druid_112.name: Mighty Storm's

legendary_druid_113.desc: When {c_important}Nature's Fury{/c} triggers a free Skill, reduce your non-Ultimate Cooldowns of the opposite type by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
legendary_druid_113.name: Symbiotic

legendary_druid_114.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus amount to your next {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} for each enemy you Crowd Control up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_druid_114.name: Earthguard

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_001.desc: {c_important}Critical Strikes{/c} from your {c_important}Storm{/c} skills make enemies {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} |4second:seconds;. Enemies that are already {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} have its duration extended by {c_number}[{SF_1}|1|]{/c} seconds instead.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_002.desc: Hurricane and Cataclysm create a Tornado every {c_number}[SF_0|1|]{/c} seconds while they are active.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_003.desc: {c_important}Storm{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike damage against {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} or {c_important}Immobilized{/c} targets.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_004.desc: Your Earth skills have an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}Overpower{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_005.desc: When you kill an enemy with an Overpowering hit, you automatically gain {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c}. This can only happen once every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_006.desc: Your {c_important}Earth{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to targets afflicted by movement impairing effects.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_007.desc: While in Werebear form, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}, for every {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} difference in current Life % between you and the target.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_008.desc: (REDESIGN){c_important}Werebear{/c} skills have an additional {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}Overpower{/c} and {c_important}Knockdown{/c} for {c_number}[SF_2|1|]{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_009.desc: While in Werebear form, you apply {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} bonus {c_important}Fortify{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_010.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skills restore {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Spirit.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_011.desc: Your {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skills gain an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance against poisoned targets.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_012.desc: While there are {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} or more poisoned enemies Nearby, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_013.desc: After shapeshifting, your Spirit costs are reduced by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_014.desc:
Casting a {c_important}Storm{/c} skill increases the critical strike chance of your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skill by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.

Casting an {c_important{Earth{/c} skill increases the critical strike damage of your next {c_important}Werebear{/c} skill by {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_015.desc: Your {c_important}Earth{/c} skills have an additional {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}Overpower{/c} targets that are {c_important}Vulnerable{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_016.desc: Your {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage against enemies affected by your {c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c}.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_017.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} skills have up to a {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} chance to entangle the target with vines, Immobilizing them for {c_number}[{SF_1}]{/c} seconds and poisoning them for {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} of the base damage dealt over {c_number}[SF_3]{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Druid_Legendary_018.desc: After spending {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Spirit, you deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Landslide{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance and deals {c_number}x[{SF_7}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage against enemies who are Stunned, Immobilized or Knocked Back.

{c_important}Wind Shear{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%|]{/c} chance to make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Storm Strike{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Immobilize all enemies hit for {c_number}[{buffduration:IMMOBILIZE}|1|]{/c} seconds.
Each time you cast {c_important}Tornado{/c}, you have a {c_number}[{SF_17}*100|%|]{/c} chance to spawn an additional {c_important}Tornado{/c}.
The size of your {c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} is preserved for {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} seconds after channeling.
{c_important}Shred{/c} gains {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} attack speed and heals for {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} of your maximum Life if an enemy is struck.
Poisoned enemies are slowed by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}.
{c_important}Pulverize{/c} deals {c_number}x[{SF_13}*100|%|]{/c} increased bonus damage when hitting {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} or more enemies.

{c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} makes you {c_important}Unstoppable{/c} while active.
{c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c} also {c_important}Fortifies{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}({fortified:MOD_FORTIFY}){/c}.
Kills reduce the cooldown of {c_important}Blood Howl{/c} by {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} second.
{c_important}Vine Creeper's{/c} Immobilize duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} second.
{c_important}Wolves{/c} deal {c_number}x[{SF_13}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to Immobilized, Stunned, Slowed, or poisoned enemies.

{c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance when struck to {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}({Fortified:FORTIFY_HEALTH}){/c}.

Increases the amount of {c_important}Fortify{/c} you gain from all sources by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c}.
Critical Strikes with {c_important}Earth{/c} skills {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}({fortified:PAYLOAD_FORTIFY}){/c}.
While {c_important}Fortified{/c} over [{SF_1}*100|%|] of your Maximum Life, your {c_important}Earth{/c} skills deal  {c_number}x[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

{c_important}Pulverize{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Immobilize all enemies hit for {c_number}{buffduration:IMMOBILIZE}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Storm Strike{/c} chains to {c_number}[SF_7]{/c} additional targets.

1HAxe_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} now shapeshifts you into a Dire Werewolf. Dire Werewolf gains {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} movement speed instead of damage reduction and a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*2|%|]{/c} Spirit cost reduction bonus. In addition, kills heal you for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} of your maximum Life.
1HAxe_Unique_Druid_001.flavor: The nights preceding the full moon are sometimes far more dangerous than the event itself. The anticipation of the upcoming event can drive some werewolves into a fever from which they never recover.
1HAxe_Unique_Druid_001.name: Waxing Gibbous

1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} Critical Strikes spawn {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}Dancing Bolts{/c} that seek enemies in the area dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage.
1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"Listen, child, to the music of the storm. It has its own rhythm. Its own melody. Hear how beautifully it sings, and perhaps one day you will be able to join in its harmony." 
â Airidah
1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.name: Tempest Song

2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Claw{/c} is now a {c_important}Storm{/c} skill and also casts {c_important}Storm Strike{/c} at {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} normal damage.
2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"She has existed in Scosglen since before Fiacla-GÃ©ar walked the land. Her purpose is a mystery, and she remains impartial in all conflicts. Approach her with deference, and she may grant you her counsel."
- Airidah, to Donan
2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.name: Greatstaff of the Crone

Chest_Unique_Druid_002.desc: Werewolf form is now your true form, and you gain {c_number}+2{/c} to all {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skills.
Chest_Unique_Druid_002.flavor:
"He was not a victim of the curse - he sought it out. As his skin split and his bones cracked, his laughter never ceased." 
â Tale of the Mad Nobleman
Chest_Unique_Druid_002.name: Mad Wolf's Glee

Chest_Unique_Druid_003.desc: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain {c_number}+2{/c} to all {c_important}Werebear{/c} skills.
Chest_Unique_Druid_003.flavor: When the Days of Ash fell upon Scosglen, the great druid Nafain reminded his disciples that nothing, not even the loss of their humanity, was too great a sacrifice to protect TÃºr DÃºlra from Astaroth's flames.
Chest_Unique_Druid_003.name: Insatiable Fury

Pants_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Your {c_important}Wolf Companions{/c} are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the {c_important}Storm Howl{/c} ability.
Pants_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"The storm's rage is my own, brother. I call, and the skies roar in reply."
- Vasily, to Bul-Kathos
Pants_Unique_Druid_001.name: Storm's Companion

Ring_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Gain {c_number}1{/c} additional companion. In addition, your {c_important}Companion Skills{/c} deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus damage.
Ring_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"A sapling from the Great Oak, left to grow at the seaward statue of the Druid's Patriarch, will on rare occasions be found twisted back upon itself, suffused with natural magic."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Ring_Unique_Druid_001.name: Vasily's Prayer

Ring_Unique_Druid_003.desc:
Gain a bonus when you kill with a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill:

{icon:bullet}{c_gold}Werewolf:{/c} Your next non-ultimate {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skill costs no resource and has no cooldown.
{icon:bullet}{c_gold}Werebear:{/c} Your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skill will heal you for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} when damage is first dealt.
Ring_Unique_Druid_003.flavor:
"By fang, claw, spear, or sword - send the bastards back to the flames from which they crawled! Soak the peat with their blood! For Fiacla-GÃ©ar! For Scosglen!"
- Nafain, during the Days of Ash
Ring_Unique_Druid_003.name: Hunter's Zenith

Loadscreen Tips.TIP001: Remember to spend your skill points when you level up to unlock new skills or improve old ones!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP003: Be sure to fill up your healing vials at the Healer {icon:Marker_HealWell, 2.0} before leaving town.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP004: Salvaging your items will produce materials used for crafting, and can also unlock new looks in your wardrobe {icon:Marker_Wardrobe, 2.0}
Loadscreen Tips.TIP005: Items lose durability and become less effective when you revive from death. You can repair your equipment at a Blacksmith {icon:Marker_Blacksmith, 2.0}
Loadscreen Tips.TIP006: You can revive other players by clicking on their spirits. They can rejoin the fight immediately!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP007: Activate any waypoints {icon:Marker_Waypoint, 2.0} that you encounter on your travels to unlock a new fast travel location.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP008: When you grow powerful enough an Occultist {icon:Marker_Essence, 2.0} can extract and replace the powers on your legendary items.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP009: Realm Rewards are shared with every character of yours on that realm. Open your map and check out the Renown panel to see what you can earn while exploring Sanctuary!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP010: The state of Sanctuary is based on the party leader's progress.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP011: Combat damage text is colored to mean different things: {c:ffffec64}Critical Strike{/c}, {c:ff78fff1}Overpower{/c}, and {c:ffff9000}Critical Hit combined with Overpower{/c}.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP012: You can increase the potency of your Healing Potion by visiting the Alchemist {icon:Marker_Crafter_Alchemist, 2.0}
Loadscreen Tips.TIP013: After finishing the campaign, new challenges and rewards await in the Nightmare, Hell and Torment world tiers!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP014: Elite enemies include Champions, Elites, Bosses, and hostile Players.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP015: Higher World Tiers grant you much higher experience bonus from killing monsters.

ParagonGlyph_063.name: Canny

desc: Grants {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} bonus to all Rare nodes within range.
ParagonGlyph_064.name: Efficacy

desc: For every 10 Intelligence purchased within range, {c_white}Trap{/c} skills deal {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} increased damage.
ParagonGlyph_065.name: Snare

ParagonGlyph_066.bonus: Critical strikes deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to targets that are not {c_important}Healthy{/c}.
desc: For every 10 Dexterity purchased within range, {c_white}Core{/c} skills deal +{c_yellow}[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} increased critical strike damage.
ParagonGlyph_066.name: Essence

ParagonGlyph_067.bonus: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Physical damage to both {c_important}Healthy{/c} and {c_important}Injured{/c} targets.
desc: Paragon nodes within range gain {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} bonus to their Physical damage and damage reduction modifiers.
ParagonGlyph_067.name: Pride

ParagonGlyph_068.bonus: Targets affected by {c_important}Trap{/c} skills take {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
desc: For every 10 Strength purchased within range, you deal {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} increased damage to targets affected by {c_white}Trap{/c} skills.
ParagonGlyph_068.name: Ambush

ParagonGlyph_069.bonus: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage while you have no active minions.
desc: Grants {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} bonus to all Magic nodes within range.
ParagonGlyph_069.name: Sacrificial

ParagonGlyph_070.bonus: {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([{SF_0} * PlayerHealthMax()]){/c}.
desc: Grants {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} bonus to all Magic nodes within range.
ParagonGlyph_070.name: Blood-drinker

ParagonGlyph_071.bonus: Whenever your minions deal damage to a target, that target takes {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds.
desc: Paragon nodes within range gain {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} bonus to their Minion Modifiers.
ParagonGlyph_071.name: Deadraiser

desc: For every 10 Intelligence purchased within range, {c_white}Skeleton Mages{/c} gain {c_yellow}[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} increased resistance to all elements.
ParagonGlyph_072.name: Mage

ParagonGlyph_073.bonus: Targets affected by {c_important}Curse{/c} skills take {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
desc: Grants {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} bonus to all Magic nodes within range.
ParagonGlyph_073.name: Amplify

desc: For every 10 Willpower purchased within range, {c_white}Golems{/c} gain {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} increased maximum Life.
ParagonGlyph_074.name: Golems

ParagonGlyph_075.bonus: Shadow damage over time effects have a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to deal double damage.
desc: For every 10 Willpower purchased within range, you deal {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} increased shadow damage over time.
ParagonGlyph_075.name: Scourge

ParagonGlyph_076.bonus: You take {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} reduced Physical damage from {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies.
desc: Grants {c_yellow}+[{GlyphAffixScalar}|1%|]{/c} bonus to all Rare nodes within range.
ParagonGlyph_076.name: Diminish

Rarespawn_Reward_1HDagger_Scorpion.flavor:
"The ancient scorpion Nine-Eyes is known as "The Terror of the Sands", and for good reason. Her massive tail can pierce the strongest armor, and her poison can melt flesh in seconds."
- Field Notes of an Unknown Iron Wolf
Rarespawn_Reward_1HDagger_Scorpion.name: Broodmother's Stinger

Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus.flavor: Even removed from the demon's body, the eye continues to weave its hypnotic patterns.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HFocus_Succubus.name: Qin's Captivating Eye

Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee.flavor: The handle of this white-hot mace bears soot marks in the shape of a clenched fist.
Rarespawn_Reward_1HMace_BanditMelee.name: Mace of Blazing Furor

Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee.flavor:
"While the origins of this accursed blade are lost to time, there is no question that wielding its dark power leaves an indelible stain on one's soul." 
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_1HSword_KnightMelee.name: Darkblade

Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost.flavor:
"So skilled was Abe-Mari at divination, they were able to perfectly predict the date of their own death.  The knowledge proved so disastrous that no mage since has attempted to re-create the feat."
- Excerpt from 'Secrets of the Mage-Clans'
Rarespawn_Reward_1HWand_Ghost.name: Wand of Abe-Mari

Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon.flavor: This massive sword's edge grows keener with each life taken.
Rarespawn_Reward_2HSword_MegaDemon.name: Infernal Edge

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial.flavor:
"Even after he was put to death, some children swore they could still hear his bell ringing softly in the breeze on moonless nights."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 5: "The Myth of Blind Edlin"
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_DrownedSpecial.name: Blind Man's Bell

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee.flavor: This vile necklace of charred goat's teeth paradoxically contains both the power to extend life as well as cut it short.
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_GoatmanMelee.name: Necklace of Inevitability

Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster.flavor:
"A foul enchantment of desire was woven into the stone that shaped Enkil. Its idolaters were helpless as their souls were ripped from their bodies to animate its writhing form."
- Field Notes of Brother Darmont
Rarespawn_Reward_Amulet_SnakeCaster.name: Eye of Enkil

Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee.flavor:
"The Captain was bleeding from at least three bite wounds, sweating from the poison and barely able to walk, but he never stopped searching for his lost comrades."
- Eulogy for Captain Willcocks
Rarespawn_Reward_Boots_SkeletonMelee.name: Captain's Ragged Boots

Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute.flavor:
"Favored by Pitiless Gur, this heavy armor remains painfully cold to the touch, even in the hottest of climates."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Rarespawn_Reward_Chest_CannibalBrute.name: Gur's Freezing Armor

Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee.flavor:
"Those who came before shall bear witness to your deeds."
- Inscription on the hilt
Rarespawn_Reward_Crossbow_GhostMelee.name: Haunted Crossbow

Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk.flavor: Those foolish few Monks who abuse their training for personal gain are banished from the Floating Sky Monastery and forced to wander the harsh and unforgiving lands beyond.
Rarespawn_Reward_Gloves_OmniMonk.name: Outcast's Handwraps

Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost.flavor:
"There is nothing better in life than to stand alone, painted red, atop a hill made from the bodies of your enemies."
- Zarozar the Mighty
Rarespawn_Reward_Helm_BarbarianGhost.name: Bloodspiller's Helm

Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee.flavor: Wearing these gore-drenched leggings fills your mind with a single overwhelming thought: to hunt.
Rarespawn_Reward_Pants_WerewolfMelee.name: Manhunter's Breeches

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord.flavor:
"Unhand me, filth! A single drop of my blood is worth an ocean of yours! Within it churns a power you could never hope to understand!"
- Lord EÃ²nan, last words
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_BloodLord.name: Blood-Cursed Band

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost.flavor:
"Dearest Will, this ring is like my love for you. Both have no end. May this ring keep you safe and help keep me in your heart during your travels. - Lucya"
- Inscription on the band
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_FlyHost.name: Trembling Ring

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith.flavor: Even the slightest touch leaves painful splinters in the flesh.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_WoodWraith.name: Ring of Splintered Wood

Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute.flavor: A malformed collection of bone, flesh and a strange, hardened ichor, this ring-shaped object almost seems to have been grown, rather than crafted.
Rarespawn_Reward_Ring_ZombieBrute.name: Grotesque Loop

Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster.flavor: A powerful relic once belonging to Jazreth the Summoner, this staff was thought lost forever.
Rarespawn_Reward_Staff_CultistCaster.name: Staff of Elemental Command

1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Immobilize your target for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds when you Critically Strike.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: A nightmarish amalgam of blood, bone and steel, this axe is as horrific, and as deadly, as its creator.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Butcher's Cleaver

1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Your skills have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to also deal {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage done by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} for {c_number}3{/c} seconds.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Whenever this ancient sword has re-appeared throughout history, it portends a time of great strife, as well as a devastating loss of life.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: Doombringer

1HSword_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Core{/c} Skills increase your Attack Speed by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: Whenever you stare at the reflection in this blade, you see a demonic figure standing behind you: vague and distorted, but always laughing.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_100.name: Oblivion

2HStaff_Unique_Generic_101.desc: After a Crowd Control effect wears off from an enemy, they take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
2HStaff_Unique_Generic_101.flavor:
"Also known as The Greatstaff of the Old Religion, this powerful relic is one of only a small handful of Skatsimi artifacts that have survived to this day."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HStaff_Unique_Generic_101.name: Staff of Lam Esen

2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc:
Increases your critical strike damage by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}. 

The other properties on this weapon can roll higher than normal.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: An unbroken lineage of unwavering strength.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Grandfather

Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|~%|]{/c} bonus maximum resource. In addition, when you take damage, drain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} resource for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} of Life you would have lost instead.
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe."
- Last words of Master Selig
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.name: Melted Heart of Selig

Boots_Unique_Generic_001.desc:
Leaves a trail of frost that {c_important}Chills{/c} enemies. 
{c_important}Chilled{/c} enemies take {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more damage.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Remorseful devotees of the Cathedral of Light must undertake a grueling pilgrimage, journeying across the frigid glacier known as the Serac Rapture. Only then may their gravest sins be forgiven.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.name: Penitent Greaves

Chest_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: Crafted by the cannibal Armoda, each piece of this interlocking armor has been sharpened into a knife's edge. Even a century after her death, the plate remained on her corpse, unable to be removed safely.
Chest_Unique_Generic_100.name: Razorplate

Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.desc: Your attacks randomly deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of normal damage.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"Will you let fear cheat you, or will you risk everything to find understanding? After all, death is simply the coin with which we purchase life."
- Zurke
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.name: Fists of Fate

Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}Freeze{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.flavor: A touch so frigid it stops the heart and chills the very soul.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.name: Frostburn

Helm_Unique_Generic_001.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to trigger a poison nova that deals {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poison damage.
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.name: Andariel's Visage

Helm_Unique_Generic_002.desc:
Gain {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} damage reduction. 
In addition, gain {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} to all skills.
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"This headdress was once worn by an assassin who disguised herself as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king and his entire lineage."
- The Fall of House Aston
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.name: Harlequin Crest

Ring_Unique_Generic_100.desc: If a {c_important}Core{/c} skill hits at least {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} or more enemies, {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the resource cost is refunded.
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: The Cult of the Triune has been thought destroyed several times over the centuries. In reality, its members hide in temples across Sanctuary, awaiting the next great power that will promise them ascendancy.
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.name: Signet of the Triune

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_Sacrific.desc: Your Maximum Life is increased by {c_number}[{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_Sacrific.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Your Blood Golem absorbs {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of damage you would take.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: While {c_important}Healthy{/c}, your Blood Golem gains {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction and {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
Necromancer_Golem_Blood_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_Sacrifice.desc: You gain {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} increased Attack Speed, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Each time your Bone Golem takes up to {c_number}{SF_1}%{/c} of its maximum Life as damage, it sheds a Corpse.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: Your Bone Golem gains {c_number}[{SF_2}|%|]{/c} maximum Life and the amount of Thorns they inherit from you is increased from {c_number}[{SF_5}|%|]{/c} to {c_number}[{SF_3}+{SF_5}|%|]{/c}.
Necromancer_Golem_Bone_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_Sacrifice.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage, but you lose the ability to summon a Golem.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeA.desc: Every {c_number}5th{/c} Iron Golem attack causes a shockwave, dealing {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_CONE_PAYLOAD}{/c} damage to the primary enemy and to enemies behind them.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeA.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeB.desc: Your Iron Golem's slam attack also makes enemies Vulnerable for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_Golem_Iron_Passive_UpgradeB.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Sa.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to Vulnerable enemies, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Sa.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.desc: Each time your Cold Mages damage enemies with their primary attack, you gain {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Essence.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.desc: Enemies who are Frozen by or damaged while Frozen by your Cold Mages' primary attack are made Vulnerable for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Cold_Passive_Up.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Your Overpower damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Reduce the Life cost of your Bone Mages' attacks from {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} to {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c}. After being alive for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, Bone Mages deal {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.desc: Each time a Bone Mage dies from its own attack, they leave behind a Corpse and {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of your Base Life {c_number}({fortified:FORTIFY}){/c}.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Sacrifice_Passi.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Your maximum Essence is increased by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c}, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Mages.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Shadow Mage attacks have a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to Stun for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds. This cannot happen on the same enemy more than once every {c_number}{buffduration:STUN_COOLDOWN}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.desc: Shadow Mages fire an additional shadow bolt every {c_number}{SF_0}th{/c} attack.
Necromancer_SkeletonMage_Shadow_Passive_.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: You gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} non-Physical Resistance, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: Every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds your Skeletal Defenders negate the next instance of Direct Damage they would take.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.desc: Increase the amount of Thorns that Defender Warriors inherit from you from {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100}|%|]{/c} to {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100}|%|]{/c}.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Defender_Pas.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: You deal {c_number}x[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} increased Shadow Damage, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: Reaper attacks against enemies who are Immobilized, Slowed, Stunned, or Vulnerable reduce the cooldown of their powerful wind-up attack by {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.desc: Reapers have a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to carve the flesh off enemies, forming a Corpse. This cannot happen on the same enemy more than once every {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_CORPSE_COOLDOWN}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Reaper_Passi.name: Upgrade B

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c}, but you can no longer raise Skeletal Warriors.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Sacrifice

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: You can raise one additional Skirmisher Warrior.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Upgrade A

Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.desc: Each time you Critically Strike, your Skirmishers Warriors' next attack Critically Strikes. Can only happen every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds.
Necromancer_SkeletonWarrior_Skirmisher_P.name: Upgrade B

legendary_necro_002.desc: Each time one of your {c_important}Summoning{/c} Minions damages an enemy, they gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_002.name: of Frenzied Dead

legendary_necro_011.desc: When you pick up {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c}, a free {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
legendary_necro_011.name: of Possessed Blood

legendary_necro_012.desc: After hitting {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} enemy, {c_important}Bone Spear's{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_012.name: Splintering

legendary_necro_016.desc: Enemies take {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage from {c_important}Blight's{/c} defiled area for each second they are in it, up to {c_random}x[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_016.name: of Plunging Darkness

legendary_necro_017.desc: {c_important}Blight's{/c} defiled area, when spawned, Pulls in enemies around the affected area.
legendary_necro_017.name: of the Void

legendary_necro_020.desc: {c_important}Decompose{/c} can chain up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional targets. When {c_important}Decompose{/c} spawns a Corpse, it has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a Corpse under all afflicted targets.
legendary_necro_020.name: Rotting

legendary_necro_022.desc: Each target hit along {c_important}Sever's{/c} path increases the scythe's damage by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}, up to {c_random}x[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_022.name: of Empowering Reaper

legendary_necro_023.desc: Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, your {c_important}Cold Skeletal Mages{/c} cast a blizzard that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage and continuously {c_important}Chills{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"/Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_023.name: Coldbringer's

legendary_necro_028.desc: {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} deals {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage to its primary target per lanced target.
legendary_necro_028.name: Blood Seeker's

legendary_necro_029.desc: When {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} hits an enemy that is already lanced, it has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to fire a {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} at a Nearby target.
legendary_necro_029.name: of Hungry Blood

legendary_necro_031.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Mages is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
legendary_necro_031.name: Viscous

legendary_necro_032.desc: {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} leaves a trail that lasts for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds and deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage per second to enemies who stand in it. Your Movement Speed is no longer reduced while {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} is active.
legendary_necro_032.name: of Bloodbath

legendary_necro_036.desc: {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} deals increased damage based on distance traveled, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_036.name: of Swelling Curse

legendary_necro_038.desc: When a segment of {c_important}Bone Prison{/c} is destroyed or expired, it deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage in an area around itself.
legendary_necro_038.name: of Bursting Bones

legendary_necro_041.desc: {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} consumes up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, dealing {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage and with a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} larger radius per additional Corpse.
legendary_necro_041.name: of Corpse Boom

legendary_necro_053.desc: While {c_important}Army of the Dead{/c} is active, your Minions gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Attack Speed and take {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} reduced damage.
legendary_necro_053.name: Unyielding Commander's

legendary_necro_054.desc: Each time that {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} damages an enemy, gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} equal to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Base Life for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_054.name: of Shielding Storm

legendary_necro_066.desc: Enemies who are Stunned by {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} are also made {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for its duration. If they die while Stunned, they have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a {c_important}Blood Orb{/c}.
legendary_necro_066.name: of Grasping Veins

legendary_necro_067.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
legendary_necro_067.name: Blood Getter's

legendary_necro_100.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills increase your Essence Regeneration by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Affix Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_100.name: of Torment

legendary_necro_101.desc: The {c_important}Ossified Essence{/c} Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills by {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} per Essence above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c}, up to {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_101.name: of Serration

legendary_necro_102.desc: {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} increases your Critical Strike Chance by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} while active.
legendary_necro_102.name: Osseous Gale

legendary_necro_103.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Essence when hitting a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy with your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills.
legendary_necro_103.name: of Exposed Flesh

legendary_necro_104.desc: The {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Passive deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage against Slowed or Chilled enemies, and {c_random}x[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} increased damage against Stunned enemies instead.
legendary_necro_104.name: Blighted

legendary_necro_105.desc: Enemies afflicted by your {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to be Stunned for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} second when they deal direct damage.
legendary_necro_105.name: Torturous

legendary_necro_106.desc: You deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Shadow Damage to enemies afflicted by both {c_important}Decrepify{/c} and {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c}.
legendary_necro_106.name: of the Damned

legendary_necro_107.desc: The {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Passive has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to form a Corpse each time it triggers.
legendary_necro_107.name: of Decay

legendary_necro_108.desc: {c_important}Blood Surge's{/c} nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
legendary_necro_108.name: Blood-bathed

legendary_necro_109.desc: {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} fires two additional waves, each dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage than the previous.
legendary_necro_109.name: Tidal

legendary_necro_110.desc: {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} reduce your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Cooldown by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_110.name: Fastblood

legendary_necro_111.desc: The {c_important}Rathma's Vigor{/c} Passive's bonuses persist for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds after you are no longer {c_important}Healthy{/c}.
legendary_necro_111.name: of Rathma's Chosen

legendary_necro_112.desc: While the {c_important}Rathma's Vigor{/c} Passive is active, you gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Movement Speed.
legendary_necro_112.name: of Untimely Death

legendary_necro_113.desc: While at full Life, {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} grant {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Essence.
legendary_necro_113.name: of Potent Blood

legendary_necro_114.desc: Each time your {c_important}Golem{/c} damages an enemy, its active Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_114.name: Hulking

legendary_necro_115.desc: The {c_important}Strength in Numbers{/c} Passive also grants your {c_important}Minions{/c} {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
legendary_necro_115.name: of Hardened Bones

legendary_necro_117.desc: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} maximum Essence per active {c_important}Minion{/c}.
legendary_necro_117.name: Requiem

legendary_necro_118.desc: Your {c_important}Skeletons{/c} gain increased damage while alive, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} after {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
legendary_necro_118.name: of Reanimation

legendary_necro_119.desc: Consuming a {c_important}Corpse{/c} increases the damage of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
legendary_necro_119.name: Cadaverous

legendary_necro_120.desc: Consuming a {c_important}Corpse{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a {c_important}Blood Orb{/c}.
legendary_necro_120.name: of the Embalmer

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_001.desc: You and your Minions deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage for each Minion type you have active. This only applies to the Minion types: Skeletal Warrior, Skeletal Mage, and Golem.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_002.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your Minions have a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to grant you a barrier for {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} of your Max Life for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_003.desc: When your Minions die, they explode and deal {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} of their Max Life as Shadow damage to nearby enemies.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_004.desc: Your Minions have {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} less Max Life but deal {c_number}x[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_005.desc: Your Golem has {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased maximum Life and deals {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_006.desc: Consuming a corpse slows enemies around it by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds. Your {c_important}Corpse{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_3}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to crowd controlled enemies.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_007.desc: With at least {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} corpses Nearby, you take {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%|]{/c} less damage.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_008.desc: Consuming a corpse grants you {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_009.desc: When your Minion is killed, it has a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} chance to leave a corpse.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_010.desc: {c_important}Blood{/c} skills deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage but cost an additional {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|1%|]{/c} of the skill's Essence cost or Cooldown as a percent of  your maximum Life.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_011.desc: {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} grant {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_012.desc: Blood Orbs also restore {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Essence when picked up.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_013.desc: {c_important}Bone{/c} skills grant you {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} damage reduction, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*100*{SF_1}|%|]{/c}, for the next {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_014.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Bone{/c} skills have a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to make enemies {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}2{/c} seconds.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_015.desc: Whenever you consume a corpse, a Bone Spirit is spawned at its location.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_016.desc: You and your Minions deal {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage to targets affected by Shadow damage over time effects.

Paragon_Necro_Legendary_017.desc: Hitting enemies with {c_important}Bone{/c} skills increases your damage by {c_number}x[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} and your maximum Essence by {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds, stacks up to {c_number}x[{SF_0}*{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} increased damage and {c_number}[{SF_1}*{SF_2}]{/c} maximum Essence.

power.skill_desc: You and your Minions deal {c_number}x[{SF_12} * 100|%|]{/c} increased damage to enemies who are being {c_important}Decomposed{/c}.
If an enemy dies while being Decomposed, you gain {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} Essence.

Sever deals {c_number}x[{SF_13} * 100|%|]{/c} increased damage for each Minion you have upon cast.

Bone Spear makes the first enemy hit {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_19}{/c} seconds.

While at least {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} enemies or a Boss are affected by {c_important}Blood Lance{/c}, you gain {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%|]{/c} Attack Speed and {c_important}Blood Lance's{/c} Essence cost is reduced by {c_number}{SF_11}{/c}.

Bone Spirit has an additional {c_number}[{SF_16} * 100|%|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance.
